mapper.select: SELECT FU.ID id, USER_NAME userName, LOGIN_NAME loginName, PASSWORD password, GMSFHM gmsfhm, TELE_PHONE telePhone, MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone, EMAIL email, LAST_LOGIN_IPADDR lastLoginIpaddr, FU.NOTE note, FU.CREATOR_ID createId, FU.UPDATE_ID updateId, HOSPITAL_ID hospitalId, DEPARTMENT department, RANK rank, LOCK_STATUS lockStatus, LOCK_TIME lockTime, ROLE_NAME roleName, ROLE_CODE roleCode, FU.HOSTlEVEL hostLevel FROM FBS_USER FU JOIN FBS_USER_ROLE FUR ON FU.ID=FUR.USER_ID JOIN FBS_ROLE FR ON FR.ID=FUR.ROLE_ID WHERE LOGIN_NAME=#{loginName} and PASSWORD=#{password};
